name: Mehr Baby
greetingText: By any chance if you forgot , your BF is an engineer, here's your surprise <3
wishText: A veryyy veryy Happy Birthday Sweetheart, I'm sorry I couldn't do alot for you this birthday,I lovee you alot❤️
textInChatBox: Happy birthday Mehr😘!! Wish you many many happy returns of the day..blah blah
text2: That's what I was about to do.
text4: I should make something from my own, that you might love :)
outroText: Tell me tumko kesa laga ye birthday wish, I coded this myself just for you
replayText: wapis rewatch krne ke liye click anywhere , Bye Love Youuuuu
